rows.label: tlk01000902_msg0002
rows.name:
Auntie Correl's over the moon that
you brought back your bride-to-be!

rows.label: tlk01000902_msg0003
rows.name:
What a super beautiful lady! Ahh, I wish 
I could have a wedding too, Kazuna does!

rows.label: tlk01000902_msg0004
rows.name:
Th-that's not what this is about!
Stop teasing me, Kazuna!

rows.label: tlk01000902_msg0101
rows.name:
As for Martis, he's really good at studying. 
That's why he got into the theological school.

rows.label: tlk01000902_msg0102
rows.name:
But... it makes me a bit sad that we won't be able 
to play together with Kukuri anymore...

rows.label: tlk01000902_msg0103
rows.name:
I'm sitting right across from him now
so we can hang out for as long as we
can. And I can peek at his notes!
